{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Assistant Manager, Card Personalization",
  "description": "Electronic Payplus Limited is a leading Nigerian smart?card and electronic payment solutions provider with over two decades of industry excellence. Incorporated in 2004 and operational since 2005, the company has evolved from POS deployment into Nigeria&rsquo;s foremost secure card manufacturer and payment solution specialist. It operates the country&rsquo;s only purpose?built smart card personalization bureau, with industry?scale capacity and world?class quality standards.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Manager, Card Personalization
Job Location:&nbsp;Ibeju-Lekki,&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	The total management of all the activities of the shifts in card personalization
	Planning the operation of the unit in conjunction with the Shift leads.
	Responsible for the management of all shift leads
	Responsible for the productivity and efficiency of the unit in terms of number of cards to be delivered per hour, per shift, per day, and per week as approved by the Management from time to time.
	Ensuring that your machine is always working at optimum capacity and efficiently at all times in conjunction with the Maintenance and Engineering department.
	Ensure Personalization and mailing of various bank cards-VERVE Debit and Prepaid cards, MasterCard Credit or Debit card.
	Ensure printing of Combo scheme cards as requested by the client.
	Ensure regular maintenance is carried out all PERSO Machines.
	Ensure strict adherence to the Quality Control Procedures.
	Prompt resolution of all customer related issues.
	Technology research.
	Develop monthly reports of staff performance.
	Develop monthly Personalization reports.
	Liaise with Electronic Payplus Limited&rsquo;s partners and association companies as the situation requires.
	Liaise with Delivery unit to ensure timely deliveries within stipulated time as stated in the SLA.
	Ensure Shredding of data after successful delivery notification from the Delivery team.
	Ensure filling of Shredded Register immediately Shredding is done.
	Send notification of data destruction to customers immediately shredding is completed.
	Ensure weekly meetings/trainings hold and are communicated to Production staff.
	Full compliance with the Standard Operating Procedure and Information Security Policy.
	Ensure all Electronic Payplus Limited&rsquo;s resources in his possession are properly taken care of.
	Handles all Administrative duties of the production department and must ensure that the card request and delivery forms are filed appropriately in the right locations.
	Must ensure that all production staff comply with requirements for job movement register and other document completion
	Any other role as may be directed by the Head Production.
	Must have worked in a similar environment or have worked within the personalization environment for at least 3 Years and with good knowledge of computer.
	Male candidates preferred.


Skills:


	Confidence
	Excellent technical skills
	Organisational skills
	Planning skills
	Interpersonal skills
	Communication skills
	Problem solving skills
	Teamworking skills
	Attention to details
	Understanding of the code, specification and regulations related to the payment card industry
	IT skills.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@epayplusng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Candidates residing around Ibeju-Lekki and environs are encouraged to apply.
	Male candidates preferred.
",

  "validThrough": "2026-03-01",

Assistant Manager, Card Personalization Job at Electronic Payplus Limited




        
    

        
        Electronic Payplus Limited is a leading Nigerian smart?card and electronic payment solutions provider with over two decades of industry excellence. Incorporated in 2004 and operational since 2005, the company has evolved from POS deployment into Nigeria’s foremost secure card manufacturer and payment solution specialist. It operates the country’s only purpose?built smart card personalization bureau, with industry?scale capacity and world?class quality standards.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Manager, Card Personalization
Job Location: Ibeju-Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	The total management of all the activities of the shifts in card personalization
	Planning the operation of the unit in conjunction with the Shift leads.
	Responsible for the management of all shift leads
	Responsible for the productivity and efficiency of the unit in terms of number of cards to be delivered per hour, per shift, per day, and per week as approved by the Management from time to time.
	Ensuring that your machine is always working at optimum capacity and efficiently at all times in conjunction with the Maintenance and Engineering department.
	Ensure Personalization and mailing of various bank cards-VERVE Debit and Prepaid cards, MasterCard Credit or Debit card.
	Ensure printing of Combo scheme cards as requested by the client.
	Ensure regular maintenance is carried out all PERSO Machines.
	Ensure strict adherence to the Quality Control Procedures.
	Prompt resolution of all customer related issues.
	Technology research.
	Develop monthly reports of staff performance.
	Develop monthly Personalization reports.
	Liaise with Electronic Payplus Limited’s partners and association companies as the situation requires.
	Liaise with Delivery unit to ensure timely deliveries within stipulated time as stated in the SLA.
	Ensure Shredding of data after successful delivery notification from the Delivery team.
	Ensure filling of Shredded Register immediately Shredding is done.
	Send notification of data destruction to customers immediately shredding is completed.
	Ensure weekly meetings/trainings hold and are communicated to Production staff.
	Full compliance with the Standard Operating Procedure and Information Security Policy.
	Ensure all Electronic Payplus Limited’s resources in his possession are properly taken care of.
	Handles all Administrative duties of the production department and must ensure that the card request and delivery forms are filed appropriately in the right locations.
	Must ensure that all production staff comply with requirements for job movement register and other document completion
	Any other role as may be directed by the Head Production.
	Must have worked in a similar environment or have worked within the personalization environment for at least 3 Years and with good knowledge of computer.
	Male candidates preferred.


Skills:


	Confidence
	Excellent technical skills
	Organisational skills
	Planning skills
	Interpersonal skills
	Communication skills
	Problem solving skills
	Teamworking skills
	Attention to details
	Understanding of the code, specification and regulations related to the payment card industry
	IT skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@epayplusng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Candidates residing around Ibeju-Lekki and environs are encouraged to apply.
	Male candidates preferred.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Managerial Architect",
  "description": "Swift Consultingan Education, Human Resources, and Management firm is currently seeking a qualified and experienced professional to fill the role of *Managerial Architect* for one of our clients in the Architectural and Construction industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Managerial Architect
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Major&nbsp;Responsibilities


	Oversee architectural projects from concept to completion
	Manage and coordinate design teams and consultants
	Review and approve architectural drawings and plans
	Liaise with clients, contractors, and regulatory bodies
	Ensure all projects meet quality standards, timelines, and budgets
	Provide leadership and mentorship to junior architects
	Support business development with proposals and presentations


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Architecture (Master&rsquo;s degree is an added advantage)
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in architectural design and project management
	Strong leadership, coordination, and team supervision skills
	Proficient in architectural design software (AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, etc.)
	Solid understanding of building codes, regulations, and construction processes
	Excellent communication, presentation, and client-facing skills
	Must reside in Lagos.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and&nbsp;&nbsp;Qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng&nbsp;using Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Managerial Architect Job at Swift Consulting




        
    

        
        Swift Consultingan Education, Human Resources, and Management firm is currently seeking a qualified and experienced professional to fill the role of *Managerial Architect* for one of our clients in the Architectural and Construction industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Managerial Architect
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Major Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversee architectural projects from concept to completion
	Manage and coordinate design teams and consultants
	Review and approve architectural drawings and plans
	Liaise with clients, contractors, and regulatory bodies
	Ensure all projects meet quality standards, timelines, and budgets
	Provide leadership and mentorship to junior architects
	Support business development with proposals and presentations


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Architecture (Master’s degree is an added advantage)
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in architectural design and project management
	Strong leadership, coordination, and team supervision skills
	Proficient in architectural design software (AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, etc.)
	Solid understanding of building codes, regulations, and construction processes
	Excellent communication, presentation, and client-facing skills
	Must reside in Lagos.


Method of Application 
Interested and  Qualified candidates should send their CV to: hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng using Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Legal Secretary",
  "description": "Divitiae Limited - Our client, a well established and reputable Law firm in Yaba, Lagos, is&nbsp;recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Legal Secretary

Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Type correspondence, documents &amp; reports
	Handle phone calls, emails and supervise access control
	Provide administrative support including filing, photocopying and binding
	Maintain accurate up-to-date filing system &amp; records
	Oversee daily office administration and manage inventory of supplies.

Legal Secretary Job at Divitiae Limited




        
    

        
        Divitiae Limited - Our client, a well established and reputable Law firm in Yaba, Lagos, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Legal Secretary

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Type correspondence, documents & reports
	Handle phone calls, emails and supervise access control
	Provide administrative support including filing, photocopying and binding
	Maintain accurate up-to-date filing system & records
	Oversee daily office administration and manage inventory of supplies.
	Manage vendors and service providers to ensure timely service delivery
	Manage and maintain records, correspondence and documents
	Coordinate schedules, appointments, and meetings
	Prepare reports, presentations and other documents
	Maintain office facilities and equipment
	High professionalism, confidentiality, and discretion.


Requirements


	Diploma / HND / BSc
	5 years of experience in a similar role
	Excellent communication, organizational & time management skills
	Excellent in the use of Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
	Proficiency in document management systems
	Effective at multitasking, time management and prioritization
	Excellent interpersonal skills
	Discretion and professionalism in handling sensitive information.
	Experience in administration, office management, or executive assistance.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to: recruitment@divitiae-ng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.???????

On the 7th of April, 2016, the company rebranded and changed her name from Fleet Technologies Limited to Vatebra. The rebranding was borne out of the need to position for innovations Beyond Now. It also aimed at positioning as the backbone of the African economy. The change is to reflect our agreed vision and mission statement.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Support Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Job type: Contract

Qualifications


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications and must have completed their NYSC&nbsp;
	Must reside in Lagos.


Method of Application&nbsp;

Customer Support Officer Job at Vatebra Limited




        
    

        
        Vatebra Limited is a leading ICT company in Africa with competency in the delivery of cutting-edge Software Solutions in the Private and Public Sector in Africa. The company was established in 2003 as Fleet Technologies Limited in order to bridge the gap in the provision of competent and dependable Software Solutions. On the 7th of April, 2016, the company rebranded and changed her name from Fleet Technologies Limited to Vatebra. The rebranding was borne out of the need to position for innovations Beyond Now. It also aimed at positioning as the backbone of the African economy. The change is to reflect our agreed vision and mission statement.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Support Officer
     

            
    



Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Job type: Contract

Qualifications


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications and must have completed their NYSC 
	Must reside in Lagos.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@vatebra.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
